project.name: MadRedder Platform Development
project.description: Web platform connecting food businesses (restaurants, bakeries, supermarkets, canteens) with consumers to reduce food waste. Businesses sell surplus food at discounted prices before closing time or expiration dates. Target: 50 partners, 5,000 consumers in year 1. Tech stack: React/TypeScript frontend, Node.js/Express backend, PostgreSQL, AWS hosting.

tasklists.name: Phase 1: Project Setup & Design
tasklists.description: Kickoff, environment setup, wireframes and UI design (M1-M2: Jan 6 - Jan 31)

tasks.name: Project kickoff and team onboarding
tasks.description: Initial kickoff meeting, define communication channels, set up project management tools

subtasks.name: Schedule kickoff meeting with GrønStart team
Set up Slack/Teams channels for communication

tasks.name: Development environment setup
tasks.description: Configure AWS infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and local development environments

subtasks.name: Set up AWS account and IAM roles
Configure GitHub repository and branch protection
Set up GitHub Actions CI/CD pipeline
Configure development, staging, and production environments

tasks.name: Domain registration and SSL setup
tasks.description: Register madredder.dk domain and configure SSL certificate

tasks.name: UX research and user flow mapping
tasks.description: Define user journeys for consumers, partners, and admins

subtasks.name: Map admin approval and management flows

tasks.name: Wireframe design
tasks.description: Create wireframes for all major screens and user flows

subtasks.name: Design homepage and landing pages wireframes
Design consumer dashboard and search wireframes

tasks.name: UI design and design system
tasks.description: Create final UI designs, component library, and style guide using Tailwind CSS

subtasks.name: Define brand colors, typography, and visual identity
Create Tailwind CSS configuration and theme
Create high-fidelity mockups for all screens
Design review and approval from Product Owner

tasklists.name: Phase 2: Backend MVP Development
tasklists.description: Core API, database schema, and authentication (M3: Feb 1 - Feb 28)

tasks.name: Database schema design and setup
tasks.description: Design and implement PostgreSQL database schema based on domain model

subtasks.name: Create User entity schema with roles

tasks.name: Authentication and authorization system
tasks.description: Implement user authentication with JWT, social login, and role-based access control

subtasks.name: Implement JWT with refresh tokens (15 min expiry)
Implement role-based access control (admin, partner, consumer)

tasks.name: User and profile management API
tasks.description: CRUD operations for users, consumer profiles, and partner profiles

subtasks.name: Partner profile and company info management

tasks.name: Partner management and approval API
tasks.description: Partner registration, admin approval workflow, and partner management

tasks.name: Offer management API
tasks.description: CRUD operations for offers including validation rules

subtasks.name: Pickup window within opening hours validation

tasks.name: Search and filtering API
tasks.description: Location-based search with filters for offers

tasks.name: Security hardening
tasks.description: Implement security measures as per requirements

subtasks.name: Implement rate limiting on all endpoints

tasklists.name: Phase 3: Frontend MVP Development
tasklists.description: Core user interfaces and flows (M4: Mar 1 - Mar 31)

tasks.name: React project setup and architecture

subtasks.name: Configure Tailwind CSS with design system

tasks.name: Public pages and navigation

tasks.name: Authentication UI
tasks.description: Login, registration, and authentication flows

subtasks.name: Consumer registration form with GDPR consent

tasks.name: Consumer dashboard and profile

tasks.name: Offer search and browsing

tasks.name: Partner dashboard and management
tasks.description: Partner-specific pages and functionality

tasks.name: Admin panel foundation

tasklists.name: Phase 4: Payment Integration

tasks.name: Payment processing backend

subtasks.name: Calculate and split platform fee vs partner payout

tasks.name: Payment UI implementation

subtasks.name: Integrate Stripe Elements for card input

tasklists.name: Phase 9: Testing & QA (UAT)
